businessInfo.name: Elite Clothing
businessInfo.description: Elite Clothing is a high-end fashion brand offering exclusive, luxury clothing and accessories for style-conscious customers. Our mission is to provide top-quality products crafted with the finest materials and a commitment to excellent customer service.

products.name: Elegant Silk Dress
products.description: A luxurious silk dress perfect for special occasions.

products.name: Stylish Leather Jacket
products.description: A premium leather jacket with a fashionable design.

products.name: Classic Cashmere Sweater
products.description: A cozy and comfortable cashmere sweater in a timeless style.
